name: Gdrive-Mirror-bot-Heroku
description: This is a telegram bot writen in python for mirroring files on the internet to our beloved Google Drive.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org DO NOT put this in quotes.

TELEGRAPH_TOKEN.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org
